reviews.review_text: Recently I purchased a watch on here before I bought the iTech fusion 3. The previous watch was one of those 159.00 ones with a super sale of 19.99 or something like that. Anyway, that 159$ one crapped the bed after like a week of having it. I noticed it when I was food shopping after work and I looked at it and it said I only did 1,000 steps while my phone tracked 16,000 steps. So I was on the hunt for another smartwatch and I came across this one and I figured why not try this next. I love it! I kinda wish it had more options when using your own photo for the background but whatever it's no biggie in that aspect. Charges fast, counts my steps accurately, love the watch band love all the features on it altogether! I recommend this watch!

the only thing I like about this item is that the band end tucks under the band so the floppy end doesn't get caught on stuff, however if you need to use the very end hole, the floppy end pops out. I wore the item for 2 days, it stopped syncing to the app. I thought maybe if I turned the watch off and then back on, it would start syncing. Instead, I could never get it to turn back on again - Even after sitting on the charger over night. It also only has selected apps for which notifications will work so if you have something like the Ring or Teams or something not included, there is no way to get notifications on the watch
still trying to figure some things such as : it tells me to choose Samsung keyboard but no direction how to... plus other stuff. but glad i got it, especially pricing.

I am have problems getting my watch app to sink with my phone, followed all instructions, still getting n error code. But even with that I am still able to access a fair amount of very useful features.
Says it has a 5 day battery. I have had to charge 2 times in last 4 days.
the utem was not as stated in the internet. i am returning as soon i come back to my base.
If provides all the services of an iwatch without all the cost
The watch is only good for telling time when u go to click on an app you have to click way above the one u want the only thing I really like is the band
